name: American Basketball: Guns & Balls
description:
This ain't just basketball... this here's AMERICAN BASKETBALL! Yeehaw!

• WIN...BY ANY MEANS NECESSARY •
You've never seen a game like this before, cowboy! Bust out your trusty revolver and defend your goal at all costs. Whether you're launching baskets on offense or blasting balls on defense, there's just one rule: there are no rules!

• JOIN OVER 20 MILLION GAMERS WORLDWIDE •
And find out why Naquatic apps like Guncrafter and Shooting Showdown have lit up the top charts and been featured by everyone from Apple to IGN, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.

• Virtual controls let you take aim with your device
• The PhysKick™ engine for complete shot control
• Head-to-head multiplayer through GameCenter
• Support for all devices including the glorious iPhone 5, iPad Mini, and iPad with Retina display
• Practice range for honing your skills
• Leaderboards and Achievements to track your improvement
• Unlockable guns and upgrades
